post.text: There's a reason the most hateful fringe of the right wing is supporting Donald Trump.

comment.author: Samuel
comment.text: I just wonder why so many "trump" supporters follow Hillary if they hate her so much. Personally, I don't get a single post from Trump on my newsfeed for good reasons. #imwithher

replies.author: Jason
replies.text: Bigoted Hillary blames BLACK man.. COLIN POWELL: "her (HILLARY) people are TRYING to PIN IT ON ME. replies.author: Solana
replies.text: This may be hard for anyone who visits this site to RATIONALIZE a MINDLESS choice to support anyone or anything the dems tell them to support, but for thousands of years, wiser and more just people than you have ALWAYS tried to get ALL SIDES of a story BEFORE making a decision, try it someday! ~ "http://www.duhaime.org/LegalDictionary/A/AudiAlteramPartem.aspx.".
